message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiations at $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand it's a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $130.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product.
I understand you're still a bit tight on budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell the product to you for $125.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the minimum value I'm willing to accept, Bob. I'll make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $122.
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $118 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I'll make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $119.
I understand you're getting close to your minimum, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $116 for the product.
